review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Coral RedSize: 512GBStyle: Flip7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: Too sensitive...has less than a month and tried putting the protective screen on by pressing as instructed.  Woke up the next morning amd the screen was messed up. Went to have it looked at since just got it, didn't drop, no water damage...nothing.  The guy at the fix it place said that it must have been from pressing down and the newer phones screens are much more sensitive these days.  Just a way to have to spend more money on parts, their insurance or new phone.  These phones cost way too much for them to break by touch. Won't purchase again

span: Screen bubbles up at the fold after about 6 months.  Search this issue on the internet.
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2026
a-link-normal: Color: Jet BlackSize: 256GBStyle: Flip7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: Do not buy! The major flaw is the screen will bubble at the fold in about 6 months. I have had 3 of these flip phones with the same problem. Samsung will not back their warranty. This issue is reported all over the internet. Samsung will blame the fault on everything else but their failed design.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2025

review-text: I purchased this device for xfinity use. Xfinity and Samsung confirmed the device is unlocked but was not able to be activated on a network. No one did anything about it but say "this is Amazon's problem". This new unlocked device apparently cannot be used on a mobile network

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Jet BlackSize: 512GBStyle: Fold7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: This was a scam. I bought the phone and had troubles transferring the eSIM card from my old phone. Apparently the phone was still carrier locked or device locked, despite the phone being listed as "unlocked". Don't buy phones off Amazon, buy them directly from your carrier or from the Samsung store.

span: Burns your butt if you want to listen to music
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Jet BlackSize: 512GBStyle: Flip7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: This phone will get too hot to keep in your pocket if you try and run youtube music and bluetooth headphones at the same time. I'm coming from an s20 ultra. Very disappointed in Samsung's recent work. Screens are nice, seems like software runs well enough. but the heat is giving me heat rashes if I try to keep it in my pocket. It's 2025, I shouldn't have to carry a phone I paid more than $1000 in my hand to walk the dog. Samsung support is not helpful.

review-text: This case did not fit the phone, right?It would not click into place.The material seemed to be very poor quality, and it just would not stay on the phone... absolutely completely useless!

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Blue ShadowSize: 512GBStyle: Fold7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: Pre-ordered and received on the release date 7/25 (hooray). However, the cover screen does not work. I've reached out to Samsung customer service and over an hour later I'm still waiting for service. From 41st to now 29th. I'll update later. So after spending hours with Samsung's customer care troubleshooting nothing worked and the cover screen is still blank. I am returning to Amazon. However, I am unable to purchase a new one at the preorder price which is unfair because it's not my fault I received a damaged product. So I'd have to pay $500 more to re-purchase. Not worth it.
